api/OpenCollar.Azure.Storage.EmulatorAct.title: Enum EmulatorAction | API Documentation
api/OpenCollar.Azure.Storage.EmulatorAct.keywords: Enum EmulatorAction Defines the actions that can be performed by the Azure Storage Emulator command. Namespace : OpenCollar.Azure.Storage Assembly : OpenCollar.Azure.Storage.dll Syntax public enum EmulatorAction Fields Name Description Clear /// The call attempts to clear all data from the Azure Storage Emulator. Init /// The call attempts to initialize the Azure Storage Emulator. Start The call attempts to start the Azure Storage Emulator. Status The call retrieves the current status of the Azure Storage Emulator. Stop /// The call attempts to stop the Azure Storage Emulator. Unknown The action is unknown or undefined. This is a sentinel used to prevent accidental use of uninitialized values. Usage of this value will typical result in an exception.

usage/index.html.keywords: Basics The purpose of the libarary is to provide simple and concise extension methods that allow arguments and state to be validated efficiently at runtime.
